Phase 1: Variables

Category Name Description Label
1 Environmental ST034Q06TA I feel lonely at school. 1 - Strongly agree
2 - Agree
3 - Disagree
4 - Strongly disagree
2 Environmental ST038Q08NA Other students spread nasty rumours about me. 1 - Never or almost never
2 - A few times a year
3 - A few times a month
4 - Once a week or more
3 Environmental ST038Q09JA In past 12 months, how often: I was in a physical fight on school property. 1 - Never or almost never
2 - A few times a year
3 - A few times a month
4 - Once a week or more
4 Environmental ST265Q03JA Agree/disagree: I feel safe in my classrooms at school. 1 - Strongly agree
2 - Agree
3 - Disagree
4 - Strongly disagree
5 Environmental ST267Q01JA Agree/disagree: The teachers at my school are respectful towards me. 1 - Strongly Disagree
2 - Disagree
3 - Agree
4 - Strongly Agree
6 Environmental ST267Q07JA Agree/disagree: The teachers at my school are interested in students’ well-being. 1 - Strongly Disagree
2 - Disagree
3 - Agree
4 - Strongly Agree
7 Gender ST004D01T Student (Standardized) Gender 1 – Female; 2 – Male
8 School ST127Q03TA Have you ever repeated a [grade]: At [ISCED 3] 1 - No, never
2 - Yes, once
3 - Yes, twice or more
9 School ST296Q01JA, ST296Q02JA, ST296Q03JA How much time spent on homework in: [Subject] homework 1 - Up to 30 minutes a day,
2 - More than 30 minutes and up to 1 hour a day,
3 - More than 1 hour and up to 2 hours a day,
4 - More than 2 hours and up to 3 hours a day,
5 - More than 3 hours and up to 4 hours a day,
6 - More than 4 hours a day
10 School STRATUM Stratum ID 5-character (cnt + original stratum ID) SGP01 - Public / Secondary; SGP03 - Private / Secondary
11 Socioeconomic HISCED Highest level of education of parents (ISCED) 1 - Less than ISCED Level 1
2 - ISCED level 1
3 - ISCED level 2
4 - ISCED level 3.3
5 - ISCED level 3.4
6 - ISCED level 4
7 - ISCED level 5
8 - ISCED level 6
9 - ISCED level 7
10 - ISCED level 8
12 Socioeconomic IMMIG Index on immigrant background (OECD definition) 1 – Native Student
2 – 2nd Generation student
3 – 1st Generation student
13 Socioeconomic OCOD1 ISCO-08 Occupation code - Mother
14 Socioeconomic OCOD2 ISCO-08 Occupation code - Father
15 Socioeconomic ST019AQ01T In what country were you and your parents born? You 1 - Country of test
2 - Other country
3 -  I don’t know.

2 - Other country
3 - I don’t know.

2 - Other country
3 - I don’t know.

2 - Other country
3 - I don’t know.
19 Socioeconomic ST230Q01JA How many siblings (including brothers, sisters, step-brothers, and step-sisters) do you have? 1 - None
2 - One
3 - Two
4 - Three or more
20 Socioeconomic ST250D06JA Which of the following are in your home? <Air-conditioner> 7020001 - Yes
7020002 - No
21 Socioeconomic ST250D07JA Which of the following are in your home? <Domestic helper (e.g. full/part-time maid)> 7020001 - Yes
7020002 - No
22 Socioeconomic ST251Q01JA How many of these items are there at your home? Cars, vans, or trucks 1 – None
2 – One
3 – Two
4 – Three or more

2 - One
3 - Two

8 - More than 10

2 – Disagree

4 – Strongly Agree

2 - 1 day
3 - 2 days
4 - 3 days
5- 4 days
6- 5 or more days
